author: Timothy Rapp
title: Alabama's Nick Saban Releases PSA Video Regarding COVID-19 Guidelines
description: Alabama head football coach Nick Saban offered some social distancing advice Tuesday for Crimson Tide fans to follow during the coronavirus pandemic. "Please wash your hands often," he said in a video released on the football team's Twitter account...
content:
Vasha Hunt/Associated Press
